Description.Text: Hyatt Place Yerevan is a modern 4-star hotel offering stylish accommodation in the heart of Yerevan. Highlights include contemporary design, onsite dining, free Wi-Fi, a gym and good transport links. Yerevan is an ancient city with a rich architectural and cultural heritage. Places of interest include Yerevan Opera House, the Blue Mosque and the impressive Saint Gregory Cathedral. There are also numerous museums, including the National Gallery of Armenia and the Mesrop Mashtots Institute of Ancient Manuscripts. Republic Square metro station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Yerevan destinations. The hotel occupies a modern mid-rise property. Facilities include a gym. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are spacious and decorated in a bright, contemporary style. Amenities include air-conditioning, tea and coffee equipment, a 42-inch flat-screen satellite TV, fridge, small sitting area and en-suite bathroom. Guests can enjoy a range of hot and cold takeaway meals at the Gallery, or choose from a selection of self-service drinks and snacks at the hotel bar. Free parking is possible onsite. The hotel has a 24-hour reception.
